casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Levon Junior JONES. No. 497A93-6. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 12, 2004. Levon Jones, Pro Se. Valerie Spalding, Special Deputy Attorney General, G. Dewey Hudson, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Defendant in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Duplin County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th day of January 2004."
